channel.title: Zero Click on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Zero Click on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: A Single Poisoned Document Could Leak ‘Secret’ Data Via ChatGPT
item.description: Security researchers found a weakness in OpenAI’s Connectors, which let you hook up ChatGPT to other services, that allowed them to extract data from a Google Drive without any user interaction.

item.title: A Single Poisoned Document Could Leak ‘Secret’ Data Via ChatGPT
item.description: Security researchers found a weakness in OpenAI’s Connectors, which let you hook up ChatGPT to other services, that allowed them to extract data from a Google Drive without any user interaction.
